ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He said, 'By Your might, I will mislead all of them
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: He said: "By Your authority, I will lead them astray,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: (Iblis) said: “By Your glory, I shall mislead them all
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: He said, "By Your Glory, I shall seduce all of them (children of Adam).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: He said, “Therefore, by oath of Your honour, I will surely mislead all of them.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: [Iblis] said: "By Your might, then I will surely mislead them all,"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: He said: Then by Thy Might I will surely make them live an evil life, all,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Said he, 'Now, by Thy glory, I shall pervert them all together,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: He said: Then, by Thy might, I surely will beguile them every one,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: He said, "By Your Honour, I will lead all of them astray,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: He said: by Thy majesty, then, I shall surely seduce them, all.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: He said, ‘By Your might, I will surely pervert them,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: (Iblis) said: "Then, by Thy power, I will put them all in the wrong,-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: [Iblis (Satan)] said: "By Your Might, then I will surely mislead them all,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: He (satan) said: 'I swear by Your Might, that I will seduce all of them
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He said, “By Your majesty, I will seduce them all.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: [Iblees] said, "By your might, I will surely mislead them all
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [38:82] He said, ‘Now, by Your might, I shall surely pervert them all,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (He said: Then, by Thy might) and favour, (I surely will beguile them every one) I will mislead all of them from Your religion and obedience, 528
